cryptix.security

Class SHA

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptix.security.MessageDigest
      • cryptix.security.SHA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Deprecated.

    public class SHA
extends cryptix.security.MessageDigest
implements Cloneable
    This class implements the SHA-1 message digest algorithm.

    References:

    1. NIST FIPS PUB 180-1, "Secure Hash Standard", U.S. Department of Commerce, May 1993.
      http://www.itl.nist.gov/div897/pubs/fip180-1.htm

    Copyright © 1995-1997 Systemics Ltd on behalf of the Cryptix Development Team.
    All rights reserved.

    $Revision: 1.7 $

    Since:
    Cryptix 2.2
    Author:
    Systemics Ltd, David Hopwood

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DATA_LENGTH
      Deprecated. 
      Length of a block (the number of bytes hashed in every transform).
      static int HASH_LENGTH
      Deprecated. 
      Length of the final hash (in bytes).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SHA()
      Deprecated. 
      This creates an SHA-1 message digest instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static cryptix.security.HashSHA CreateHash(byte[] hash)
      Deprecated. 
      Use new MessageHash("SHA-1", hash) instead.
      static byte[] hash(byte[] data)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix").digest(data) instead.
      static byte[] hash(String str)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix").digest(cryptix.mime.LegacyString.toByteArray(str)) instead.
      static cryptix.security.HashSHA hashAsMessageHash(byte[] data)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MessageHash.fromDigest(MessageDigest, byte[]) (MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix"), data instead.
      static cryptix.security.HashSHA hashAsMessageHash(String str)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MessageHash.fromDigest(MessageDigest, byte[]) (MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix"), cryptix.mime.LegacyString.toByteArray(str) instead.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Deprecated.

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(String str)
        Deprecated. Use MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix").digest(cryptix.mime.LegacyString.toByteArray(str)) instead.
        Returns the SHA-1 hash of a single string.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to hash.
        Returns:
        the corresponding MessageHash

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(byte[] data)
        Deprecated. Use MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-1", "Cryptix").digest(data) instead.
        Returns the SHA-1 hash of a single byte array.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to hash.
        Returns:
        the corresponding MessageHash

      • CreateHash

        public static cryptix.security.HashSHA CreateHash(byte[] hash)
        Deprecated. Use new MessageHash("SHA-1", hash) instead.

        hash - a hash
        Returns:
        a HashSHA object whose value as a byte array is hash
